snippet: After a deal with another publisher fell through, Vikram Seth’s sequel, “A Suitable Girl,” has been acquired by an imprint of the British publisher Orion.
abstract: After a deal with another publisher fell through, Vikram Seth’s sequel, “A Suitable Girl,” has been acquired by an imprint of the British publisher Orion.

headline.main: Vikram Seth's 'Suitable Boy' Sequel Finds a New Home
headline.print_headline: ‘Suitable Boy’ Sequel Finds a New Home
